004package kut;
005
006/** Cryptographic functions. */
007public class Cryp {
008  Cryp () {}
009
010  /**
011   * Returns a random (possibly not valid B64) String of length 'length' with
012   * B64 characters.
013   * @param length Length
014   * @return A String
015   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if length &lt;= 0.
016   */
017  public static String genk(int length) {
018    if (length <= 0) {
019      throw new IllegalArgumentException("'" + length + "' is less than 0");
020    }
021
022    String alpha = B64.alpha;
023    int len = alpha.length();
024    char[] r = new char[length];
025    for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
026      r[i] = alpha.charAt(Mth.rndi(len));
027    }
028    return new String(r);
029  }
030
031  /**
032   * Codifies 'k' irreversibly in a B64 String of length 'length'.
033   * @param s Seed
034   * @param length Length of return
035   * @return A String
036   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if s is an empty String.
037   */
038  public static String key(String s, int length) {
039    if (s.length() == 0) {
040      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Key is an empty String");
041    }
042
043    String k0 = s + "codified in irreversibleDeme is good, very good!\n\r8@@";
044    String b64 = B64.encode(k0);
045    byte[] k = B64.decodeBytes(b64);
046    int lenk = k.length;
047
048    int sum = 0;
049    for (int i = 0; i < lenk; ++i) {
050      byte b = k[i];
051      sum += (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
052    }
053
054    int length2 = length + lenk;
055    byte[] bs = new byte[length2];
056    byte[] bs1 = new byte[length2];
057    byte[] bs2 = new byte[length2];
058
059    int ik = 0;
060    int v1, v2, v3, v4;
061    for (int i = 0; i < length2; ++i) {
062      byte b = k[ik];
063      v1 = (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
064
065      b = k[v1 % lenk];
066      v2 = v1 + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
067
068      b = k[v2 % lenk];
069      v3 = v2 + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
070
071      b = k[v3 % lenk];
072      v4 = v3 + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
073
074      sum += i + v4;
075      bs1[i] = (byte)sum;
076      bs2[i] = (byte)sum;
077      ++ik;
078      if (ik == lenk) {
079        ik = 0;
080      }
081    }
082
083    for (int i = 0; i < length2; ++i) {
084      byte b = bs2[i];
085      v1 = (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
086
087      b = bs2[v1 % length2];
088      v2 = v1 + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
089
090      b = bs2[v2 % length2];
091      v3 = v2 + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
092
093      b = bs2[v3 % length2];
094      v4 = v3 + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b);
095
096      sum += v4;
097      bs2[i] = (byte)sum;
098      b = bs1[i];
099      bs[i] = (byte)(sum + (b < 0 ? 256 + b : b));
100    }
101
102    return B64.encodeBytes(bs).substring(0, length);
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Encode 'tx' with 'k'.
107   * @param k Key
108   * @param tx String to encode
109   * @return 'tx' encoded
110   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if s is an empty String.
111   */
112  public static String encode (String k, String tx) {
113    String b64 = B64.encode(tx);
114    int len = b64.length();
115    String k2 = key(k, len);
116
117    byte[] r = new byte[len];
118    for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
119      r[i] = (byte)(b64.charAt(i) + k2.charAt(i));
120    }
121
122    return B64.encodeBytes(r);
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * Decode 'tx' with 'k'.
127   * @param k Key
128   * @param tx String to edcode
129   * @return 'tx' decoded
130   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if s is an empty String or 'tx' is not a
131   *         valid encoded String.
132   */
133  public static String decode (String k, String tx) {
134    byte[] b64 = B64.decodeBytes(tx);
135    int len = b64.length;
136    String k2 = key(k, len);
137
138    char[] r = new char[len];
139    for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
140      r[i] = (char)(byte)(b64[i] - k2.charAt(i));
141    }
142
143    return B64.decode(new String(r));
144  }
145}
